name: Minu Holdings Limited
description: Developer of micro unsecured loan services platform intended to change the financial health of Mexican employees. The company's services offer early access to salary by co-coordinating with the company's human resource department with no change to finance or change the dates of court or payroll, enabling employees to gain access to their earned wages whenever they need, instead of having to wait for payday.
one_liner: Developer of micro unsecured loan services platform intended to change the financial health of Mexican employees. The company's services offer early access to salary by co-coordinating with the company's human resource department with no change to finance or change the dates of court or payroll, enabling employees to gain access to their earned wages whenever they need, instead of having to wait for payday.
